alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 8:03PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Pasco, Pinellas and northern Hillsborough Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 802 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hillsborough River State Park to East Lake-Orient Park to near Macdill Air Force Base. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Largo, Pinellas Park, Plant City, Temple Terrace, Seminole, Zephyrhills, Lutz, Brandon, St. Petersburg, Palm Harbor, South Highpoint, Hillsborough River State Park, Zephyrhills South, Palm River-Clair Mel, Tampa International Airport, East Lake-Orient Park, Zephyrhills West and Land O Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
